4.title: Knock-knock
4.plot: Giovanna gets a surprise visitor at an inopportune moment. Raquel also has a caller she never expected to see again. Giovanna shares some exciting news with her mom, Lilly who only wants to dish about her date at Malibu's Paradise Cove with a distinguished gentleman caller.

5.title: Who Put the Cookie in the Cookie Jar?
5.plot: While Giovanna is deciding how to deal with a fresh heartbreak, she reconnects with an old friend from high school. Nora finds herself jealous of Giovanna's "Original Asian Friend". Nora is deadlocked about how to handle her husband Mike. While Raquel just wants to get rid of her house guest.

6.title: Spies R-Us
6.plot: Giovanna and Simone go on a reconnaissance mission to meet up with Constance. Mike and Nora argue about the newest member of their family. Giovanna hears from an old flame who also happens to be her first love.

imdb.plot outline: Giovanna Garde is on the verge of turning 30 years old, and she seems to have it all. She has a fantastic job writing a weekly health and fitness column for the L.A. Times. She also writes her own anonymous blog called "The Avant Garde Goddess" that has become quite popular with over 2 million followers. But on her 30th birthday, Giovanna gets an unexpected surprise, when she is laid off from her job at the L.A. Times. To make her terrible, horrible, no good, very bad birthday even worse, this is also the day she's moving out of the apartment she shared with her live-in ex-boyfriend, Vince. Meanwhile, Giovanna's best friend and ex-party girl, Nora, is having trouble balancing motherhood with her busy social life.
imdb.title: The Avant Garde Goddess
plot: Giovanna Garde is on the verge of turning 30 years old, and she seems to have it all. She has a fantastic job writing a weekly health and fitness column for the L.A. Times. She also writes her own anonymous blog called "_The Avant Garde Goddess_ (qv)" that has become quite popular with over 2 million followers. But on her 30th birthday, Giovanna gets an unexpected surprise, when she is laid off from her job at the L.A. Times. To make her terrible, horrible, no good, very bad birthday even worse, this is also the day she's moving out of the apartment she shared with her live-in ex-boyfriend, Vince. Meanwhile, Giovanna's best friend and ex-party girl, Nora, is having trouble balancing motherhood with her busy social life.::Hope Pennel
